examples.example: 多数人的努力奋斗共同铸就了这个美好和谐的社会。

translate.english: The hard work of the majority of people has jointly created this beautiful and harmonious society.

examples.example: 多数情况下，只要我们坚持努力，就一定能取得成功。

translate.english: In most cases, as long as we insist on working hard, we will surely achieve success.

examples.example: 多数同学都能积极参与班级活动，让班级氛围变得更加活跃和融洽。

translate.english: Most students can actively participate in class activities, making the class atmosphere more active and harmonious.
